lbl.navbar.app.title: Secret Santa
lbl.modal.settings.title: Settings
alert.step1.heading: Step 1
alert.step1.welcomeMessage: Hello! 👋 Welcome to Step 1 of organizing your Secret Santa 🎅! Here you can start by adding participants to the game.
alert.step1.instruction1: 1. Click the ADD button ➕ to enter each participant's name and email.
alert.step1.instruction2: 2. If you need to make changes, use the pen icons ✏️ to edit or the trash can 🗑️ to remove a participant.
alert.step1.instruction3: 3. Once everyone has been added, click NEXT ➡️ to proceed to the next step.
table.participants.heading: List of participants
modal.addParticipantInstruction: Enter the details of the participant you want to add
modal.participantNameHelp: The name that will be displayed in the email
modal.participantEmailHelp: The address to which the email will be sent
alert.step2.heading: Step 2
alert.step2.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Step 2 🌟! Here you can make sure your Secret Santa is perfect for everyone!
alert.step2.description: Sometimes, you might want to prevent some people from giving gifts to each other! Well, this is the step to avoid that! 👍
alert.step2.instruction1: 1. Click on the exclude icon 🚫 to prevent one person from gifting another, avoiding unwanted pairings.
alert.step2.instruction2: 2. After setting your exclusions, click NEXT ➡️ to continue.
alert.step2.instruction3: 3. If you want to review your choices, click BACK ⬅️ to return to the previous step.
modal.excludeParticipants.title: Exclude participants
alert.step3.heading: Step 3
alert.step3.welcomeMessage: Here we are at Step 3 🥳, the final step before unleashing the party!
alert.step3.instruction1: 1. Check the Participants summary table 👀 to make sure everything is correct.
alert.step3.instruction2: 2. If everything is perfect, press SEND! ✉️ to shuffle the names and find out who you will give the gift to! 🎁
alert.step3.instruction3: 3. If changes are needed, use the BACK button 🔙 to make the necessary corrections.
alert.step3.closingRemark: Ready for the most exciting gift exchange of the year? Let's start the countdown! 🎅🎁⏰
modal.confirmation.title: Confirmation
modal.confirmation.body: All set? Confirm to draw the pairs!
modal.error.title: Error
modal.success.title: Success!
message.error.call: An error occurred during the call
alert.step4.closingRemarks: The pairs for the year's most famous gift exchange have finally been drawn! 🎉
alert.step4.closingRemarks.2: Now, all that's left is to dive into the search for the perfect gift to surprise and delight your secret friend! 🎅🎁
home.header.title: Draw your Secret Santa!
home.header.description: Participate in the most exciting Christmas game and discover who your Secret Santa will be this year!
home.features.random.title: A touch of unpredictability!
home.features.random.description: Thanks to the advanced random drawing system and the ability to specify exclusions for each participant, you can enjoy a personalized experience without any surprises! No more awkward and embarrassing gifts!
home.features.email.title: Directly in your inbox!
home.features.email.description: Thanks to the convenient and automated email delivery, you no longer have to worry about hiding pairings from prying eyes! The name of the person you will give the gift to is waiting in your inbox!
home.features.possibilities.title: Endless possibilities!
home.features.possibilities.description: Not just for Christmas! The fantastic experience of gift-giving can be enjoyed on any occasion! Whether it's birthdays, anniversaries, corporate events, or just to add a touch of cheer to a meeting, the Secret Santa game is just waiting for the list of participants!
home.features.gifts.title: Enjoy exchanging gifts!
home.features.gifts.description: Discover the true meaning of giving with our Secret Santa game! Share the happiness and surprise of receiving a gift specially thought for you, creating unforgettable moments with friends, family, or colleagues!
home.callToAction.title: Now it's your turn!
home.callToAction.description: What are you waiting for? Draw your Secret Santa and dive into the world's most famous festive gift exchange adventure!
home.callToAction.description.2: Let yourself be surprised by the perfect gift that's just waiting to be discovered!
